message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by our previous customers. I believe it could be a great asset for you as well. For this unique opportunity, I am offering it to you for $150. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're placing on your product, $150 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it, which is the maximum I can afford. Let me know what you think.
